00025 #ifndef _BASE_TESTINTERFACE_
00026 #define _BASE_TESTINTERFACE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/array>
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Named>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace base {
00035 
00036 
00037 class TestInterface : public ReferencedObject, public Named
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   class TestResults : public ReferencedObject 
00041   {
00042   public:
00043     TestResults() {}
00044     
00045     virtual String className() const { return String("TestResults"); }
00046     
00047     void addResult(const String& testName, bool success)
00048       { results.push_back( std::make_pair<String,bool>(testName, success) ); }
00049   
00050   protected:
00051     array< std::pair<String, bool> > results; ///< test name, success pair
00052   };
00053   
00054   
00055   // concrete tests must implement these
00056   virtual void setUp() = 0;                             ///< initialize local members ready for tests
00057   virtual void runTests(ref<TestResults> results) = 0;  ///< run test(s), if any
00058   virtual void tearDown() = 0;                          ///< cleanup local members after tests
00059 
00060 protected:
00061   TestInterface() {}
00062   TestInterface(const String& name) : Named(name) {}
00063   TestInterface(const TestInterface& ti) : Named(ti) {}
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 } // base
00068 
00069 #endif
